author: Willy
content: Agreed with above. These multimillion dollar toys are for the rich. Racing on a foil edge should be of their own “modified” class.

author: Capt. J. Vincent Collins
content: 12 Meters where the pinnacle of match racing!

author: Mike Lee
content:
Bring back the J’s!! More beautiful, more crew involved, Much less costly. (each entry limited to one boat built) more useful to somebody else after the AC races are done, vastly less wasteful.
Return of the Beauty. Farewell the Beast.
